content: feel like a hollywood starlet in the romantic sunset boulevard top crocheted from sleeve to sleeve this lacy spring top works equally well for a casual day at the movies or a dressy date night **recommended yarn ** we crochet hawthorne fingering http //shrsl com/4os3h **skill level ** intermediate **notions ** tapestry needle stitch markers 2 **sizing** sizes xs s m l xl 2x 3x 4x 5x to fit actual bust circumference 30 34 38 42 46 50 54 58 62 / 76 86 5 96 5 106 5 117 127 137 147 5 157 5 cm pattern includes approximately 0-4 / 0-10 cm positive ease choose the size from the **finished bust measurement below** that corresponds to this for a comfortable fit if a more oversized fit is desired i recommend choosing one size up finished measurements bust circumference 32 36 5 40 44 48 51 5 56 59 5 65 / 81 92 5 101 5 112 122 131 142 151 165 cm body length 24 25 25 25 26 26 26 27 27 / 61 63 5 63 5 63 5 66 66 66 68 5 68 5 cm sleeve length from shoulder 8 8 8 8 5 8 5 8 5 9 5 9 5 9 5 / 20 5 20 5 20 5 21 5 21 5 21 5 24 24 24 cm neck width 9 5 10 11 12 12 5 13 13 13 5 13 5 / 24 25 5 28 30 5 31 5 33 33 34 34 cm **yarn needed ** 650 725 800 890 960 1035 1115 1205 1270 yds 595 665 730 810 880 945 1025 1105 1165 m fingering weight yarn
